movies.title: The Snow Flurry
movies.plot: A flashback story of a young man, from his disgraced birth ,his harsh life and his forbidden love, until when broken-hearted, can break out in search of a place where to live means more than being alive.
movies.simplePlot: A flashback story of a young man, from his disgraced birth ,his harsh life and his forbidden love, until when broken-hearted, can break out in search of a place where to live means more than being alive.

biography.bio: Keiko Kishi was born on August 11, 1932 in Yokohama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Tendre et folle adolescence (1960), Kwaidan (1964) and The Rendezvous (1972). She was previously married to Yves Ciampi.
biography.name: Keiko Kishi

biography.bio: Ineko Arima was born on April 3, 1932 in Osaka, Japan as Seiko Nakanishi. She is an actress, known for The Human Condition I: No Greater Love (1959), Fleurs d'équinoxe (1958) and Crépuscule à Tokyo (1957). She was previously married to Kinnosuke Nakamura.
biography.name: Ineko Arima

biography.bio: Yoshiko Kuga was born on January 21, 1931 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Good Morning (1959), Fleurs d'équinoxe (1958) and Zero no shôten (1961). She was previously married to Akihiko Hirata.
biography.name: Yoshiko Kuga

biography.bio: Yûsuke Kawazu was born on May 12, 1935 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer (1961), Naked Youth (1960) and Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II (1993).
biography.name: Yûsuke Kawazu

biography.bio: Chieko Higashiyama was born on September 30, 1890 in Chiba, Japan as Sen Watanabe. She was an actress, known for Tokyo Story (1953), Début d'été (1951) and The Idiot (1951). She died on May 8, 1980.
biography.name: Chieko Higashiyama

biography.bio: Yasushi Nagata was born on October 11, 1907 in Nagasaki, Japan. He was an actor, known for Stray Dog (1949), Shinobugawa (1972) and The Human Condition I: No Greater Love (1959). He died on September 12, 1972.
biography.name: Yasushi Nagata

biography.bio: What an amazing career! Few can boast a longer one (64 years of activity). Few have been able to have to relate to three generations. And it is pretty sure that no one can compare with him in terms of faithfulness to a director: Chishu Ryu indeed appeared in no fewer than fifty-two out of fifty-four of his master Yasujirô Ozu. He played in 187 films or TV films and could be a very versatile actor: for instance in 1936, when he was thirty, he embodied a student in one film and an old man in another. However he was perfect in Ozu's films, most often, as a simple, unobtrusive man whose humanity is revealed through the hardships of everyday life. How could Japanese cinema have done without Chishu Ryu?
biography.name: Chishû Ryû

biography.bio: Born Toshiko Nonaka, she began acting as Toshiko Kôno before changing her name again after World War II during the golden age of Japanese cinema to Kuniko Igawa. She became a café owner after she retired, which occurred in 1977, in Kamakura. Coffee Igawa is still a going concern despite her death in 2012 and being run by her relatives who had taken over the operation of the café earlier as Igawa had slipped, fallen and was unable to continue as before. Igawa was in approximately 60 films
biography.name: Kuniko Igawa

biography.bio: Toshio Hosokawa was born on September 6, 1916 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Tora! Tora! Tora! (1970), Black Cat Mansion (1958) and Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters (1985). He died on August 8, 1985.
biography.name: Toshio Hosokawa

biography.bio: Tooru Hanayagi is an actor, known for The Snow Flurry (1959).
biography.name: Tooru Hanayagi

biography.bio: Masako Izumi was born on July 31, 1947 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Une jeune fille à la dérive (1963), Tattooed Life (1965) and Hanayome wa jûgo sai (1964).
biography.name: Masako Izumi

biography.bio: Kayoko Hiraoka is an actress, known for The Snow Flurry (1959).
biography.name: Kayoko Hiraoka

biography.bio: Shinobu Takeno is an actor, known for The Snow Flurry (1959).
biography.name: Shinobu Takeno

biography.bio: Masanao Kawakane is an actor, known for My Face Red in the Sunset (1961), The Snow Flurry (1959) and Fleurs d'équinoxe (1958).
biography.name: Masanao Kawakane

biography.bio: Shinichirô Minami is an actor, known for The Human Condition I: No Greater Love (1959), Farewell to Dream (1956) and The Snow Flurry (1959).
biography.name: Shinichirô Minami
